column4: Hi @ all! why I find only ubuntu desktop 8.04 in a file .iso of 700 MB?
Hi @ all! why I find only ubuntu desktop 8.04 in a file .iso of 700 MB?
because that's the size of it?  It will burn to a cd just burn it slow.. slow.. slow
yes.. but there are lots of extra stuff on the cd that isn't necessarily installed.. you also have all the installs for Open Office, gimp and many other programs.
